item.title: Proxmox Email Alerts Setup
item.description: 1. Install mailutils SSH into proxmox node and become root user. Run the following commands to download extra software dependencies we’ll need. apt update apt install -y libsasl2-modules mailutils 2. Enable 2FA for the gmail account. This is the account that will be used by proxmox to send emails. Go to security settings 3. Create app password for the account. Go to App Passwords Select app: Mail Select device: Other Type in: Proxmox or whatever you want here 4.
